name: giantants
text: It is past time for bars to be serving these.  I mean it. Jager Bombs? Who gives a shit?

name: hellofyellin
text: Jager Bombs are the plague that are killing our pub culture.

name: badganjil
text: You are getting chubbed, mah fry-end

name: hellofyellin
text: Hahthankyou.

name: straw
text: This is important information.  You are a servant of the people and common good.

name: hellofyellin
text: My only regret is that I have but one life to live for my message board.

name: tekende
text: My former roommate who turned out to be a douchebag LOVED jager bombs. I never saw the attraction. Yeah, they'd get you drunk as hell, but thirty minutes later you're asleep.

name: hellofyellin
text:
They are bad for your body and your soul. They are the Tool of Iniquity and Satan's Bile.

Maybe that last one was a little strong.

name: farqussus
text: I would have thought Satan's Bile would taste worse.

name: ford
text:
The unfortunate thing about alcohol is that anything that is actually pleasant to drink is inevitably taken as the exclusive property of popped-collar college douchebags.

This is why i smoke pot.

name: idsyen
text: The wisdom of Solomon, my friends. You saw it here first.

name: paco
text:
pot is also the property of college kids.

I'm waiting for the lames.

name: mangtastic
text: Oh contrare!  Most of the people I know who smoke pot either didn't go to college or they have dropped out.

name: fuckin_wizard
text: I've smoked with some kids in college once. I was one of those kids in college. The next day I wore a polo shirt for the first time and proceeded to pop the collar.

name: troy_convers
text: That is so like a Bill Hicks comment, it should be.

name: rude_mechanical
text: Car Bombs are far superior.

name: hellofyellin
text:
It is my thought that Car Bombs are a waste of good beer. Guinness is perfect on it's own.

Chubbed anyway for veracity of the statement.

name: lux
text: Given his name, he may mean literal car bombs.

name: deimosrising
text: Curacao and Styrofoam packing peanuts. So futuristic, I got drunk thinking about it.

name: greyfield
text:
The Drink of Tomorrow: number one source of The Vomit of Tomorrow and the Hangover of the Day After Tomorrow.

Provided you don't choke and die from ingesting packing peanuts.

name: centipede_damascus
text: What exactly do you yell when you are hell of yelling about the sex?

name: ssddr
text: YEAH YOU PUT THAT PENIS IS THAT VAGINA YOU ARE SUCH A DUUUUUUDE

name: jstegall
text: Don't forget about RUUUDE TITTIES!

name: giantants
text: Also hangin' naturals.

name: killerlimpet
text: A comment left by killerlimpet was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by freakscene, straw, slalvation)

name: alphagator
text: and rad chilies

name: tekende
text: RAAAAAAD!

name: killingthejay
text: THIS IS A HOMEBOY!

name: buttermoths
text: Your post became even better when I noticed that this unknown commenter is yelling "IS THAT VAGINA?" at the TV.

name: tekende
text: "IS THAT VAGINA" is a question that may be asked during a viewing of The Flaming Lips' film Christmas on Mars .

name: hellofyellin
text: This.

name: red_dawn
text: I love how pissed off Beef is.

name: closefriend
text: He sees panel 6 coming, and recognizes it as the sound of the bartender cuttng the three of them off.

name: sargasm
text: I would love to see an Achewood-themed cocktail recipe book.  There are a few in the cookbook, but not enough.  Has anyone ever made a Satellite TV?

name: johnnygeo
text:
http://www.imjustdrinking.com/wiki/index.php?title=Achewood
I contributed like half of these

name: epicurus
text:
Beef's expressions.

Also I have almost made a "Drink of tomorrow" on accident.

name: never_die
text: SHowbiz and Ray were alcohol ENGINEERS as kids.  Engineers, i tell you.

name: nathanielperson
text: Quiz me, Biz!

name: hendetta
text: The Mexican Payphone- Tequila left outside of your local convenience store in an open cup for two days, plus the thing furthest back in your fridge.

name: littlefatdog
text: The Sneaky Cadaver - 1 1/2 oz licorice liqueur, 6 dashes Tabasco, 1 dead ladybug at the bottom

name: ttagxamm
text: Drugtest Lemonade: six pack cheap beer   1 tube frozen limeade [basically just a shandy with a gross name]

name: dougthehead
text: Ray is able to replenish his partying power by drawing off the energy of those around him.

name: tbtabby
text: It disturbs me to think that the only thing differentiating Ray and SHowbiz, according to this strip, is money.

name: tonyhighwind
text: I disagree. I can understand that from a certain perspective money is still the difference there, but a poorer person could find a classier way to feed themselves in that exact same 7-11 than what Showbiz is doing.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Oh, lame.  I guess that's my html mistake cherry popped.

name: nyu
text: This is every reunion ive had with alumni friends.

name: steerpike66
text: I just got the Achewood cookbook and The Drink of Tomorrow and the Satellite TV have melded: it's now a spacey shape (of space, not Kevin Spacey) with frozen mini-marshmallows on the tips, floating in a mixture of Gin and Blue Curacao.

name: akadriver
text: Is this the only strip where "hella" is rendered as such and not as "hell of?"

name: libelandslander
text: I recall going past another one recently.

name: akadriver
text: This is true. We lookin' at hella porno has it right in the title. Apparently when you mix Ray with porn you get "hella."

name: heccibiggs
text: I fucking hate your avatar so much . I don't even know why, it's not THAT bad... It just repulses me to the point of rage for some reason.

name: pogo
text: Me, too.  Sickening.

name: akadriver
text: :( the man is just ringing a bell, people.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: aww. chubby for source vid

name: tekende
text: I hate it too.

name: tonyhighwind
text:
Gin... to cover!

This strip is when I knew Achewood was totally going to be a thing.

name: comrade_tom
text: If these drinks were adopted by mainstream drinking establishments, alcohol technology would grow EXPONENTIALLY.
